ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 13
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The aviaks there do not drop aviak feathers, only aviak talons (look like chicken feet). And the aviaks there are actually NOT tougher than the ones in
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 14 May 1999, Sergio Non wrote:

> > Anyone found Aviak Feathers yet?
> > We killed a whole bunch of Aviaks yesterday and got none.
>
> You might want to try the Aviak Island in the Ocean of Tears. It's at
> roughly 2300,4300 -- way off Stormbreaker's path, so you'll have to swim
> there or take a canoe. The Aviaks there are tougher than what's in South
> Karana, but should still very easy for a level 22 character like yourself, I
> would think.

The aviaks there do not drop aviak feathers, only aviak
talons (look like chicken feet).

And the aviaks there are actually NOT tougher than
the ones in South Karana. The toughest aviak
on the island is much weaker than the tougher
aviak in South Karana.
